mapper.select: SELECT a.dt AS day , NVL(SUM(b.daily_sales), 0) AS daily_sales FROM (SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7 + LEVEL, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS dt FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <= 7) a, (SELECT TO_CHAR(order_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS day , SUM(total_price) AS daily_sales FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN TO_CHAR(sysdate-6,'YYYY.MM.DD') AND TO_CHAR(sysdate+1 , 'YYYY.MM.DD') GROUP BY order_date) b WHERE a.dt = b.day(+) GROUP BY a.dt ORDER BY a.dt
